actions.step: Marinate the chicken in the cooking wine, corn starch, and salt.
Stir fry the garlic, ginger, and dried chili peppers with a splash of oil on medium heat in a wok until fragrant.
Turn up the heat to high and brown the chicken with the spices.
Deglaze the wok with the Coca-Cola and the soy sauce.
Reduce the heat and simmer until the sauce thickens.
Stir in the green onions and serve immediately.
